material.mattext: Using these rules find the mean and standard deviation of the university's cost, and give an interpretation of your result.

mean = 8000 + 45 * (mean of X) = 8000 + 45 * 30 = $9350 variance = 45(squared) * (variance of X) = 45(squared) * 5(squared), and therefore stdev = 45 * 5 = $225 The interpretation of these results is that on average, the university's cost of offering the course is $9350. Typically, the cost is $225 away from this average.
